fullText: Jon Robin Baitz has written a smart, sophisticated family drama that crackles with wit and bristles with political tension.
dtliExcerpt: Jon Robin Baitz has written a smart, sophisticated family drama that crackles with wit and bristles with political tension.
bwwExcerpt: Helmer Joe Mantello did a savvy job of recasting 'Other Desert Cities' for its Broadway transfer. When the show preemed at Lincoln Center earlier this year, it wasn't clear that Jon Robin Baitz's tightly wrapped family drama about a patrician clan of Old Guard California Republicans even had a leading character. That ensemble vibe survives in this production, but with the magnetic Rachel Griffiths ('Six Feet Under') now taking the lead in the part of the renegade daughter from New York, it's easier to overlook the artifices of the plot and surrender to the drama.
showScoreExcerpt: Jon Robin Baitz has written a smart, sophisticated family drama that crackles with wit and bristles with political tension.
